subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: The Belmont Stakes winner Rags to Riches will miss the Alabama Stakes on Saturday, and is now scheduled to run in the $300,000 Ruffian Stakes at Belmont Park on Sept. 8. The trainer Todd Pletcher said Rags to Riches, his star 3-year-old filly, missed too much training time while being examined for an illness.
